name: Zyronix Bot
description: ZyronixBot [WA Multi Device] is a WhatsApp based third party application that provide many services with a real-time automated conversational experience.

BOT_NAME.description: Enter the name of bot here. (e.g.: Zyronix Bot ⚡)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your sudo number with country code here. (e.g.: 94771227821)

FOOTER_TEXT.description: Enter footer text of your bot here. (e.g.: Powered by Zyronix Bot

PREFIX.description: Enter prefix of bot here, or leave it empty for use multi-prefix.

ST_PACK_NAME.description: Enter package name of stickers created by bot here. (e.g.: Zyronix Stickers)

ST_AUTHOR_NAME.description: Enter author/creator name of stickers created by bot here. (e.g.: Maazin Ahamed)

WELCOME_MSG.description: Welcome the new participants of group, set true for yes and false for no. (e.g.: true)

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Show read receipts automatically for status of your contacts, set true for yes and false for no. (e.g.: true)
